//OBJECTIVE
Build BestTrip mobile app based on Android Platform (Nov 2017 - Dec 2017)
Customer Everybody
Description
This is the app mobile that helps people show map, search
direction, compare journey cost among taxi companies(Mai Linh,
Vinasun,....), show taxi types(4 seated, 7 seated, premium), call
taxi faster(call taxi company phone number - self booking),
search taxi category, view all categories of taxies and prices.
Team size
2
My position
Developer
My responsibilities
- Code
- Bug fixing
- Optimize code
Technologies used
- Android studio 3.0
- MVP Pattern
- Dagger 2
- Retrofit 2
- Rxjava
- GitHub
- Firebase

Build Franchise mobile app based on Android (Aug 2018 - Jan 2019)
Customer Everybody
Description
This is a mobile application that lets anybody order food at
restaurants. People can find menus, promotions, and
order/delivery times or use it to book a table before they
arrive. Users can also gain points and exchange the points for
discounts at the restaurant.
